data.title: Bundesliga Transfer Round-Up: All The Done Deals So Far This Summer
data.meta_description: It’s been a busy summer in the Bundesliga with a number of high profile additions and big name departures. Check in to Transfer Window: Done Deal Alerts FC Bayern Munich Ins: Thiago Alcantara (FC Barcelona), Jan Kirchhoff (1. FSV Mainz 05), Mario Götze (Borussia Dortmund), Mitchell Weiser (1.FC Kaiserslautern, loan return) Outs: Mario Gomez (ACF …
data.text:
It’s been a busy summer in the Bundesliga with a number of high profile additions and big name departures.

Check in to Transfer Window: Done Deal Alerts

FC Bayern Munich

Ins: Thiago Alcantara (FC Barcelona), Jan Kirchhoff (1. FSV Mainz 05), Mario Götze (Borussia Dortmund), Mitchell Weiser (1.FC Kaiserslautern, loan return)

Outs: Mario Gomez (ACF Fiorentina), Anatoliy Tymoshchuk (Zenit St. Petersburg), Nils Petersen (Werder Bremen, loan made permanent), Maximilian Riedmüller (released)

Borussia Dortmund

Ins: Henrikh Mkhitaryan (FC Shakhtar Donetsk), Pierre-Emerick Aubameyang (AS St. Etienne), Sokratis Papastathopoulos (SV Werder Bremen), Hendrik Bonmann (RW Essen), Lasse Sobiech (SpVgg Greuther Fürth, loan return)

Outs: Lasse Sobiech (Hamburger SV), Leonardo Bittencourt (Hannover 96), Moritz Leitner (VfB Stuttgart, loan), Julian Koch (1. FSV Mainz 05, was on loan at MSV Duisburg), Daniel Ginczek (1. FC Nuremberg, was on loan at FC St. Pauli), Felipe Santana (FC Schalke 04), Mario Götze (FC Bayern Munich), Marvin Bakalorz (released)

Bayer 04 Leverkusen

Ins: Roberto Hilbert (Besiktas JK), Emir Spahic (Sevilla FC), Giulio Donati (Inter Milan), Robbie Kruse (Fortuna Düsseldorf), Heung Min Son (Hamburger SV), Andres Palop (Sevilla), Konstantinos Stafylidis (PAOK FC), Carlinhos (Jahn Regensburg, loan return)

Outs: Andre Schürrle (Chelsea FC), Michal Kadlec (Fenerbache SK), Daniel Carvajal (Real Madrid CF), Christoph Kramer (Borussia Mönchengladbach, loan), Michael Rensing (Fortuna Düsseldorf), Hajime Hosogai (Hertha Berlin), Daniel Schwaab (VfB Stuttgart), Nicolai Jörgensen (FC Kobenhavn, loan made permanent), Manuel Friedrich (released)

FC Schalke 04

Ins: Leon Goretzka (VfL Bochum 1848), Adam Szalai (1. FSV Mainz 05), Christian Clemens (1. FC Köln), Felipe Santana (Borussia Dortmund), Tim Hoogland (VfB Stuttgart, loan return), Anthony Annan (CA Osasuna, loan return), Sergio Escudero (Getafe, loan return)

Outs: Philipp Hofmann (FC Ingolstadt, loan, was on loan at SC Paderborn), Sergio Escudero (Getafe CF), Jose Manuel Jurado (FC Spartak Moskva), Christoph Moritz (1. FSV Mainz 05), Christoph Metzelder (retired), Raffael (FC Dynamo Kyiv, loan return), Ibrahim Afellay (FC Barcelona, loan return)

SC Freiburg

Ins: Admir Mehmedi (FC Dynamo Kyiv), Denis Perger (FC Koper), Francis Coquelin (Arsenal FC, loan), Gelson Fernandes (Sporting Clube de Portugal), Christopher Jullien (AJ Auxerre), Vaclav Pilar (VfL Wolfsburg), Mike Hanke (Borussia Mönchengladbach), Niclas Höfler (FC Erzgebirge Aue, loan return), Erich Sautner (Hallescher FC, loan return), Felix Klaus (Greuther Fürth)

Outs: Denis Perger (SV Wehen Wiesbaden, loan), Beg Ferati (FC Sion), Erik Jendrisek (Energie Cottbus), Simon Brandstetter (Rot-Weiß Erfurt, was on loan at Karlsruher SC), Cedrick Makiadi (SV Werder Bremen), Max Kruse (Borussia Mönchengladbach), Daniel Caligiuri (VfL Wolfsburg), Johannes Flum (Eintracht Frankfurt), Jan Rosenthal (Eintracht Frankfurt), Ivan Santini (NK Zadar, loan return), Ezequiel Calvente (Real Betis Balompie, loan return)

Eintracht Frankfurt

Ins: Joselu (1899 Hoffenheim, loan), Stephan Schröck (1899 Hoffenheim), Marco Russ (VfL Wolfsburg, loan made permanent), Felix Wiedwald (MSV Duisburg), Johannes Flum (SC Freiburg), Jan Rosenthal (SC Freiburg)

Outs: Vadim Demidov (released), Karim Matmour (1. FC Kaiserslautern), Julian Dudda (SV Werder Bremen II), Oka Nikolov (Philadelphia Union), Martin Amedick (SC Paderborn 07), Heiko Butscher (VfL Bochum), Marvin Schwäbe (1899 Hoffenheim), Olivier Occean (1. FC Kaiserslautern, loan)

Hamburger SV

Ins: Lasse Sobiech (Borussia Dortmund), Johan Djourou (Arsenal FC), Jacques Zoua (FC Basel 1893), Hakan Calhanoglu (Karlsruher SC, loan return), Kerem Demirbay (Borussia Dortmund II), Jonathan Tah (Hamburger SV U-17s), Paul Scharner (Wigan Athletic FC, loan return), Robert Tesche (Fortuna Düsseldorf, loan return)

Outs: Heung Min Son (Bayer 04 Leverkusen), Jeffrey Bruma (Chelsea FC, loan return)

Borussia Mönchengladbach

Ins: Raffael (FC Dynamo Kyiv), Christoph Kramer (Bayer 04 Leverkusen, loan), Max Kruse (SC Freiburg), Matthias Zimmermann (Greuther Fürth, loan return), Elias Kachunga (Hertha BSC Berlin, loan return)

Outs: Matthias Zimmermann (SV Sandhausen, loan), Igor de Camargo (1899 Hoffenheim, loan made permanent), Mike Hanke (SC Freiburg), Mathew Leckie (FSV Frankfurt, loan made permanent), Niklas Dams (released), Tolga Cigerci (VfL Wolfsburg, loan return), Alexander Ring (HJK Helsinki, loan return)

Hannover 96

Ins: Konstantin Fuhry (VfB Stuttgart U-19), Leonardo Bittencourt (Borussia Dortmund), Edgar Prib (Greuther Fürth), Florian Ballas (1. FC Nuremberg II), Salif Sane (AS Nancy-Lorraine), Christopher Avevor (FC St. Pauli, loan return)

Outs: Sergio da Silva Pinto (UD Levante), Samuel Radlinger (Rapid Vienna, loan), Daniel Royer (Austria Wien, was on loan at FC St. Pauli), Mohamed Abdellaoue (VfB Stuttgart), Mario Eggimann (1. FC Union Berlin), Konstantin Rausch (VfB Stuttgart), Niko Gießelmann (Greuther Fürth), Johan Djourou (Arsenal FC, loan return)

1. FC Nuremberg

Ins: Emanuel Pogatetz (VfL Wolfsburg), Mariusz Stepinski (Widzew Lodz), Daniel Ginczek (Borussia Dortmund), Martin Angha (Arsenal FC), Nick Weber (Borussia Dortmund Under-19), Josip Drmic (FC Zürich), Almog Cohen (Hapoel Tel-Aviv FC, loan return), Wilson Kamavuaka (Jahn Regensburg, loan return), Philipp Klement (Hansa Rostock, loan return)

Outs: Timm Klose (VfL Wolfsburg), Julian Wießmeier (SV Wehen Wiesbaden, was on loan at Jahn Regensburg), Timmy Simons (Club Brugge KV), Manuel Zeitz (SC Paderborn, loan deal made permanent) Sebastian Polter (VfL Wolfsburg, loan return)

VfL Wolfsburg

Ins: Timm Klose (1. FC Nuremberg), Kevin Scheidhauer (VfL Bochum, loan return), Max Grün (Greuther Fürth), Daniel Caligiuri (SC Freiburg), Stefan Kutschke (RB Leipzig), Felipe Lopes (VfB Stuttgart, loan return), Rasmus Jönsson (FSV Frankfurt, loan return), Giovanni Sio (FC Sochaux-Montbeliard, loan return), Ibrahim Sissoko (Panathinaikos FC, loan return), Ja-Cheol Koo (FC Augsburg, loan return), Patrick Ochs (1899 Hoffenheim, loan return), Akaki Gogia (FC St. Pauli, loan return), Tolga Cigerci (Borussia Mönchengladbach, loan return),

Outs: Simon Kjaer (LOSC Lille), Emanuel Pogatetz (1. FC Nuremberg, was on loan at West Ham United FC), Mateusz Klich (PEC Zwolle, loan deal made permanent), Marco Russ (Eintracht Frankfurt, loan deal made permanent), Michael Schulze (Energie Cottbus, loan deal made permanent), Vaclav Pilar (SC Freiburg, loan), Yohandry Orozco (Deportivo Tachira FC), Sebastian Polter (1. FSV Mainz 05, was on loan at 1. FC Nuremberg), Marwin Hitz (FC Augsburg), Thomas Kahlenberg (released), Sotirios Kyriakos (released), Alexander Madlung (released)

VfB Stuttgart

Ins: Moritz Leitner (Borussia Dortmund, loan), Mohamed Abdellaoue (Hannover 96), Sercan Sararer (Greuther Fürth), Marco Rojas (Melbourne Victory), Konstantin Rausch (Hannover 96), Thorsten Kirschbaum (Energie Cottbus), Daniel Schwaab (Bayer 04 Leverkusen), Patrick Funk (FC St. Pauli, loan return)

Outs: Raphael Holzhauser (FC Augsburg, loan), Shinji Okazaki (1. FSV Mainz 05), Federico Macheda (Manchester United FC, loan return), Felipe Lopes (VfL Wolfsburg, loan return), Tim Hoogland (FC Schalke, loan return), Marc Ziegler (retired), Mamadou Bah (released)

1. FSV Mainz 05

Ins: Joo-Ho Park (FC Basel 1893), Dani Schahin (Fortuna Düsseldorf), Shinji Okazaki (VfB Stuttgart), Julian Koch (Borussia Dortmund), Sebastian Polter (VfL Wolfsburg), Johannes Geis (Greuther Fürth), Christoph Moritz (FC Schalke 04), Malik Fathi (1860 Munich, loan return)

Outs: Anthony Ujah (1. FC Köln, loan made permanent), Deniz Yilmaz (Elazigspor, was on loan at SC Paderborn), Radoslav Zabavnik (SV Sandhausen), Adam Szalai (FC Schalke 04), Marcel Risse (1. FC Köln) Jan Kirchhoff (FC Bayern Munich), Andreas Ivanschitz (UD Levante), Radoslav Zabavnik (released), Ivan Klasnic (released), Marco Caligiuri (Eintracht Braunschweig)

SV Werder Bremen

Ins: Luca Caldirola (Inter Milan), Florian Grillitsch (St. Pölten), Cedrick Makiadi (SC Freiburg), Nils Petersen (FC Bayern Munich, loan made permanent), Denni Avdic (FC Zwolle, loan return)

Outs: Sokratis Papastathopoulos (Borussia Dortmund), Kevin De Bruyne (Chelsea FC, loan return), Christian Vander (retired)

FC Augsburg

Ins: Panagiotis Vlachodimos (Olympiacos, loan), Raphael Holzhauser (VfB Stuttgart, loan), Halil Altintop (Trabzonspor AS), Mathias Fetsch (Kickers Offenbach), Marwin Hitz (VfL Wolfsburg)

Outs: Milan Petrzela (released), Torsten Oehrl (Eintracht Braunschweig), Sebastian Langkamp (Hertha Berlin), Stephan Hain (1860 Munich), Ja-Cheol Koo (VfL Wolfsburg, loan return), Dong-Won Ji (Sunderland AFC, loan return), Knowledge Musona (TSG 1899 Hoffenheim, loan return), Simon Jentzsch (released), Marco Thiede (SV Sandhausen)

1899 Hoffenheim

Ins: Anthony Modeste (FC Girondins de Bordeaux), Tarik Elyounoussi (Rosenborg BK), Marvin Schwäbe (Eintracht Frankfurt), Igor de Camargo (Borussia Mönchengladbach, loan made permanent), Knowledge Musona (FC Augsburg, loan return), Joseph-Claude Gyau (FC St. Pauli, loan return), Edson Braafheid (FC Twente Enschede, loan return)

Outs: Igor de Camargo (R. Standard de Liege), Luis Advincula (Associacao Atletica Ponte Preta), Joselu (Eintracht Frankfurt, loan), Stephan Schröck (Eintracht Frankfurt), Daniel Williams (Reading FC), Sandro Wieser (SV Ried), Chris (released), Takashi Usami (Gamba Osaka, loan return), Heurelho Gomes (Tottenham Hotspur FC, loan return), Patrick Ochs (VfL Wolfsburg, loan return)

Hertha Berlin

Ins: Alexander Baumjohann (1. FC Kaiserslautern), Johannes van den Bergh (Fortuna Düsseldorf), Hajime Hosogai (Bayer 04 Leverkusen), Sebastian Langkamp (FC Augsburg), Marco Djuricin (Jahn Regensburg, loan return), Daniel Beichler (SV Sandhausen, loan return), Fanol Perdedaj (Lyngby BK, loan return)

Outs: Felix Bastians (VfL Bochum), Alfredo Morales (FC Ingolstadt)

Eintracht Braunschweig

Ins: Simeon Jackson (Norwich City FC), Jan Hochscheidt (Erzgebirge Aue), Marco Caligiuri (1. FSV Mainz 05), Omar Elabdellaoui (Manchester City, loan made permanent), Jan Washausen (Kickers Offenbach, loan return), Torsten Oehrl (FC Augsburg), Timo Perthel (MSV Duisburg)

Outs: Oliver Petersch (Arminia Bielefeld), Chengdong Zhang (CD Mafra, loan return), Pierre Merkel (Hallescher FC)
